changelog:
## Changes in v1.0.34

### Bug Fixes (Sport Section)
- Fixed channel number showing "1" instead of correct number when opening from Sport section
- Fixed UP/DOWN navigation not working correctly during Sport channel fullscreen
- Channel navigation now uses the same logic as TV section (full channel list)

### Diagnostics
- Added detailed startup logging to help diagnose intermittent dark screen issue after app update

### Previous fixes (v1.0.33)
- Fixed focus restoration when dismissing movie/series detail dialog in Search section
